description: This is the object type for the optional adapterTypeSpecific parameter of the retrieve_objects() adaptive function when the adapterType of the adapterId is vfs.

recursive.description: If true, directories will be recursively traversed.
recursive.label: Recursive

includeHidden.description: If true, filenames that begin with dot ('.') will be included.
includeHidden.label: Include Hidden

subdirectory.description: If specified, the retrieve will start in the specified vfs subdirectory instead of the vfs root. The value can not start with '/', must end with '/', and can not contain '\', './' or '../'.
subdirectory.label: Subdirectory

suffix.description: If specified, only files with filenames that end with the specified suffix are included.
suffix.label: Filename Suffix
